statements: SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT economic_indicator, macroeconomic_data FROM market_trends WHERE prediction > 0.5
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE economic_indicator LIKE 'GDP%'
SELECT prediction, economic_indicator FROM market_trends ORDER BY prediction DESC
SELECT date, macroeconomic_data FROM market_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE economic_indicator = 'GDP';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE prediction > 0.8 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT economic_indicator, AVG(macroeconomic_data) AS avg_data FROM market_trends GROUP BY economic_indicator;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE prediction BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT economic_indicator, MAX(prediction) AS max_prediction FROM market_trends GROUP BY economic_indicator HAVING MAX(prediction) > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM macroeconomic_data;
SELECT indicator_name, data_value FROM macroeconomic_data WHERE data_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM machine_learning_models WHERE training_data_size > 1000 ORDER BY training_time DESC;
SELECT model_name, algorithm_used, training_data_size FROM machine_learning_models WHERE training_time < '12 hours';
SELECT indicator_name, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM macroeconomic_data GROUP BY indicator_name;
SELECT * FROM macroeconomic_data WHERE indicator_name = 'GDP' ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT market_trend_id, indicator_name, data_value FROM macroeconomic_data WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC, data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_name, algorithm_used, training_data_size FROM machine_learning_models WHERE algorithm_used = 'Random Forest' ORDER BY training_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_learning_models WHERE training_data_size >= 1000 ORDER BY model_id;
SELECT indicator_name, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM macroeconomic_data GROUP BY indicator_name ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Economic_Indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM Economic_Indicators WHERE indicator_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM Machine_Learning_Models WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.9;
SELECT * FROM Economic_Indicators WHERE indicator_id = 1;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM Economic_Indicators WHERE indicator_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Market_Trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Economic_Indicators ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM Machine_Learning_Models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM MacroeconomicData
SELECT id, indicator_name, data_date FROM EconomicIndicators
SELECT indicator_name, value FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM MachineLearningModels ORDER BY accuracy DESC
SELECT id, trend_name, trend_value FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_value > 100
SELECT id, indicator_name, data_date, value FROM MacroeconomicData ORDER BY data_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM EconomicIndicators WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date_published ASC
SELECT model_name, algorithm, accuracy FROM MachineLearningModels WHERE accuracy >= 0.9
SELECT trend_name, trend_date, trend_value FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, indicator_name, value FROM MacroeconomicData WHERE value < 0 ORDER BY value ASC
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_description FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT trend_name, trend_category, trend_start_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_end_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT data_category, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM macroeconomic_data GROUP BY data_category;
SELECT model_name, model_type, created_date FROM machine_learning_models ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_description, last_updated_date FROM economic_indicators WHERE data_source = 'XYZ Source';
SELECT trend_name, trend_category FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_end_date DESC;
SELECT data_category, AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM macroeconomic_data GROUP BY data_category;
SELECT model_name, model_type, created_date FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_type LIKE '%regression%' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
